channel.title: How-To Geek
channel.description: We explain technology. Learn more with our articles, reviews, tips, and the best answers to your most pressing tech questions.

item.title: Rack-Mount Servers: Powerful but Power-Hungry Homelab Choice
item.dc:creator: Patrick Campanale
item.description: Retiring my big server for a desktop saved me more than just rack space.
item.content:encoded: Rack-mount servers seem like the best solution for a powerful homelab, right? That’s what I thought—but I was so wrong. I recently decommissioned two of my rack-mount servers in favor of a single desktop-based server, and it was the best change I’ve made to my homelab in years.

item.title: Plex Just Had a Security Breach
item.dc:creator: Arol Wright
item.content:encoded: The past few weeks haven't been the best for Plex. After the company disclosed a catastrophic vulnerability in its client, it has now suffered a breach. Surprisingly, the two things are not related.

item.title: Unlock the Power of Bartering: Upgrade Your Gear for Free!
item.dc:creator: Patrick Campanale
item.description: Did you know you could trade a cutting board for a photo printer? Because I didn't.
item.content:encoded: When was the last time you bartered for something? Last week? Last month? Never? You should totally start bartering. I recently used the barter system to get a new Kindle and a photo printer, and it inspired me to barter more. Here’s why you should use the barter system more (and why I wish more people used it in general)

item.title: Google Temporarily Removes a New Pixel 10 Feature
item.dc:creator: Cory Gunther
item.description: Google's AI-powered daily hub gets yanked.
item.content:encoded: Google's fancy new Pixel 10 and Pixel 10 Pro are finally available, and users are taking advantage of its many new features, from a powerful Pro Res Zoom and Magic Cue to Google's new Daily Hub. Unfortunately, the latter feature isn't all that great, and Google's removed it from phones until further notice.

item.title: Top EVs and PHEVs to Snag Before Tax Incentives End Sept. 30
item.dc:creator: Adam Gray
item.description: These electric vehicles and plug-in hybrids still qualify for thousands in tax credits—if you act fast.
item.content:encoded: If you’ve been thinking about getting an electric vehicle (EV) or plug-in hybrid (PHEV), this is a gentle reminder that the federal tax credit of up to $7,500 is set to expire on September 30, 2025.

item.title: Why Plex is My Favorite Way to Stream Live TV
item.dc:creator: Aran Folsom
item.description: This platform has become my all-in-one solution to watching TV.
item.content:encoded: Watching TV. A simple pastime that once involved nothing more than turning on the television and flipping through a handful of broadcast TV stations before settling on something to stare at for a few hours. Then came cable, and now subscription-based media streaming platforms like Netflix, Prime Video, and others, that are funneled into your home over the internet.

item.title: The Hottest Gift of 1993 Was My Gateway to Technology
item.dc:creator: Joe Fedewa
item.category: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
item.content:encoded: It’s 1993, and the Holiday season is in full swing. Mrs. Doubtfire is on the big screen, and Doom is about to become an overnight smash hit. However, a 5-year-old boy has his heart set on something else. A movie prop that became a real toy—the Talkboy Deluxe.

item.title: 5 Best Linux Distros for Playing AAA Windows Games
item.dc:creator: Dibakar Ghosh
item.description: You haven't experienced Linux gaming if you haven't gamed on these distros!
item.content:encoded: Want to play Windows games on your Linux computer but don't know where to start? Did you hear some Linux distros are better suited for gaming but don't know which ones to try? Well, here's a list going over the five best Linux distros that can help you play AAA Windows games.

item.title: 8BitDo Arcade Controller Review: All-Button Design and Pro Layout
item.dc:creator: Bill Loguidice
item.description: The 8BitDo Arcade Controller features a sleek, all-button leverless design and a precision quad-movement layout.
item.content:encoded: All-button controllers promise greater precision, speed, and comfort, particularly for fighting games. Although its use cases have limits, the 8BitDo Arcade Controller is an affordable and, more importantly, quality way to game in this unique way.

item.title: Signal Finally Gets A Long-Awaited Feature
item.dc:creator: Arol Wright
item.content:encoded: Signal has managed to position itself as a strong competitor to WhatsApp and similar apps, but it lacks one very important thing—cloud backups. Now, we have them, though they work a bit differently from how backups work in other apps.
